title: Display customer details above new door entry form

requirements.text: In the main door entry view (the 'form' screen in App.tsx), display a read-only customer details section above the DoorEntryForm component, showing the collected customer name and mobile number from state.

quotes: Add customer details above new door entry

acceptanceCriteria: The customer name and mobile number collected on the CustomerInfoForm screen are visible above the DoorEntryForm on the form view.
The customer details section is read-only (not editable inline).
The section is styled consistently with the existing amber/stone warm neutral theme.
The customer details section remains visible while the user adds door entries.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not alter the CustomerInfoForm flow or the three-view navigation logic (customerInfo → form → quotation) in App.tsx beyond adding the display section.
nonGoals: Allowing the user to edit customer details from the form/door-entry view.
Changes to the QuotationView customer info display.
